analysis.Summary: Vue page component that renders a feed of blog posts, applies sorting and filtering based on route parameters and query strings, and displays each post using a CardBlogpost component.
analysis.Purpose: Serves as the main blog listing page in the community module, driving data fetch, filter synchronization with the URL, and rendering of individual blog post cards.

Components.name: Feed
Components.responsibility: Fetches and paginates a list of items using the provided store.read method and renders them via a scoped slot.

Components.name: CardBlogpost
Components.responsibility: Renders an individual blog post card given a blogpost object and the current user ID.

Components.name: Breadcrumbs
Components.responsibility: Imported but not currently used in the template; likely intended for page-level navigation breadcrumbs.

Functions.name: blog.read
Functions.description: Provided to Feed as the store.read handler; fetches posts from the community store with given options.

Functions.name: onMounted
Functions.description: Lifecycle hook that initializes the blog.state.filter from the current route query parameters when the component mounts.

Functions.name: watch(blog.state.filter)
Functions.description: Watches for deep changes in the filter state, maps filter values back to the route query string, and replaces the current URL without reloading the page.

analysis.Usage: Registered as a page component in the community module router. Mounted at a route that provides an optional `category` param and query filters (tags, period). Other parts of the app navigate to it or link to `/blog/:category?tags=...&period=...`.
Notes: The `<style>` block is present but emptyâ€”styling may be inherited or defined at a higher level.
Commented-out code hints at a default category fallback and breadcrumb inclusion that could be enabled in future.
Breadcrumbs is imported but not used in the template; consider removing or integrating it.
Filter synchronization ensures deep-linkable and shareable URLs for blog post filtering.
